about_the_game:
NOARA REVOLUTIONIZES THE TURN-BASED GAME

Noara : The Conspiracy is a new hybrid strategy game that offers a unique experience, a mix of RTS, turn-based and card games.

A brand new genre, named MOCA, for Multiplayer Online Chess Arena. Thanks to a unique mechanic, Noara revolutionizes turn-based games by offering the possibility to play in real time during your opponent's turn!

The time when you had to endure enemy assaults without doing anything is over!

In Noara you can heal, dodge, block, retaliate, stun, attack and much more... All during your opponent's turn! Awesome, isn't it?!

A COMPETITIVE

Unity is strength– Noara: The Conspiracy is a team-based competitive game that pushes you and your ally to the limit as you climb the ranks. In intense 2v2 battles, choose your brother in arms and get ready for epic fights.

Blending turn-based strategy with real-time action, Noara delivers a unique gameplay experience, where each battle is a fresh tactical challenge. Our goal is to create a highly replayable game, with regular tournaments to give players unforgettable esports moments.

A MULTITUDE OF STRATEGIES

Build your army - Choose your battalion carefully as the game progresses and adapt your own strategy. Together with your ally, you can choose the army composition that best suits your style of play, but also the strategy of your opponent!

Unlock Caste bonuses - The Caste system allows you to obtain powerful synergies and considerably improve the statistics of the units present on the battlefield. Currently there are 10 caste types per army, giving you a wide range of possible strategies.

Use your stronghold - The game ends when one of the two strongholds has been destroyed. Defend your stronghold at all costs and make good use of its skills to gain an advantage. Currently there are over 20 different skills, and the right use of each one can make a big difference to the outcome of a battle.

Manage your resources - The first battleground you will fight on is on the outskirts of the Crossroads, in the Carmine Forest. Here you will find many objectives, including harvesting areas. These areas will allow you to collect resources and exchange them for the money present in Noara: the "Khina".

Good management and use of your resources will maximise your chances of winning the war.

Buy, sell or get out - Djakpa's shop will amaze you with the variety of items it offers. You can buy items to strengthen your units, pay mercenaries, and even take advantage of the many services Djakpa offers, such as the ability to strengthen your stronghold to resist enemy assaults. Don't be mistaken, Djakpa seems very friendly, but he is only interested in your Khina wallet.

Fight relentlessly! - Noara combines the thoughtfulness of turn-based strategy games with the speed of real-time games. This unique gameplay mechanic brings great replayability and will make every battle a real tactical challenge. 

AN ATYPICAL STORY

Noara is a vast heroic-fantasy universe that extends far beyond the video game. If two races fight each other in our first game, there are many more in the Lands of Noara and if you want to know more, we invite you to read the first volume entitled "Noara - The Last Moon".

Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo or AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 5600+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 2 Go or AMD Radeon™ RX 560 2 Go or Intel® UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 ou AMD FX Series Processor or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 8 Go or AMD Radeon™ RX Vega 64 8 Go or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Since the tragedy of the Last Moon, the Lands of Noara are once again under threat. Take up arms and dive into this competitive turn-based game, build your army, react in real time to your opponent's actions and try to win the game!
